thread.title: SaaS Sales Executive Matt Gahr Joins Chrome River as Chief Sales Officer

author: cnbc.com
title: SaaS Sales Executive Matt Gahr Joins Chrome River as Chief Sales Officer
text:
Former Cornerstone OnDemand Sales VP to Spearhead Global Sales for LA-based Expense Management Leader
LOS ANGELES--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Chrome River Technologies , Inc., a global leader in expense and invoice management solutions, announces that it has appointed Matt Gahr to lead its global sales organization. Matt joins Chrome River from SaaS HR software leader, Cornerstone OnDemand (CSOD), where he was Vice President Sales, Americas, overseeing more than 100 sales professionals. During his nine years at CSOD, he and his team drove constant above-quota results, directly contributing to the company’s strong growth.
Prior to joining CSOD, Matt held a variety of sales leadership roles for both emerging and established organizations, including Gevity (now TriNet) and Randstad. He also co-founded and led sales for GetListed, an early-stage technology company with a unique recruiting marketplace model.
“Matt joins us at an exciting point in our evolution,” said Alan Rich, co-founder and CEO at Chrome River. “Our domestic and international growth over the past year has established us within the industry and with the analyst community as a global leader in expense and invoice management solutions. Matt’s leadership will help us to build on this foundation. We believe in a sales organization that truly helps companies find the right solution for their business. Matt shares these core values.”
“I have watched Chrome River’s growth over the past several years as it has emerged as one of LA’s major tech success stories,” said Matt Gahr, chief sales office at Chrome River. “The company has invested heavily in innovation and has a market-leading product suite with legions of very satisfied customers. I believe that this combination, along with an excellent senior leadership team, lays a great foundation for growth. I’m confident that we will continue to see major growth in our market share of expense and invoice management solutions among mid-size to large global organizations.”
Matt earned his BS in Business Administration and International Affairs at the University of New Hampshire, and completed his MBA in Technology/Entrepreneurship at the Rady School of Business at the University of California, San Diego.
About Chrome River
Chrome River Technologies, Inc. lets business flow for some of the world’s largest and most-respected global organizations. Our powerful, yet easy-to-use SaaS expense management and invoice automation solutions deliver the most modern global and mobile experience in the marketplace. Our highly-configurable business rules engine supports your evolving compliance and reporting requirements in today's ever-changing business climate. Chrome River is rated as a Leader in expense management by analyst firm IDC, and is loved by CFO, CIOs, AP teams, travel managers and business travelers alike.
